doc:
Frank Welker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Welker 0 Franklin Wendell Welker (born March 11, 1946) is an American voice actor best known for his role as Fred Jones from the Scooby-Doo franchise since its inception in 1969 and as the voice of Scooby-Doo since 2002. He is also known as the voice of Megatron in the Transformers franchise and as the voice and vocal effects of Nibbler on Futurama. In 2016, Welker was honored with an Emmy Award for his lifetime achievement. Franklin_Wendell_Welker ( born March_11_,_1946 ) is an_American_voice_actor best known for his_role as Fred_Jones from the_Scooby-Doo_franchise since its_inception in 1969 and as the_voice of Scooby-Doo since 2002 . He is_also_known as the_voice of Megatron in the_Transformers_franchise and as the_voice_and_vocal_effects of Nibbler on Futurama . In 2016 , Welker was_honored with an_Emmy_Award for his_lifetime_achievement .
